alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 8:05AM MST until March 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by earlier upstream rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 500 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding on Tonto Creek through Tonto Basin. Unbridged crossings are not safe to pass. Impacts may last beyond the expiration time. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 802 AM MST, a streamflow gauge on Tonto Creek, upstream from Tonto Basin, measured 6.3 feet. Unbridged crossings in Tonto Basin, including A Crossing, Bar X Crossing, Greenback Crossing, and Store Crossing are not safe to pass with this type of flow. - Although water levels are falling, streamflow will remain dangerous for low water crossings through at least early next week. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
